articles.title: About
articles.contents:
Distill is a publication format for scientific and technical writing,
native to the web.
Learn more about using Distill for R Markdown at https://rstudio.github.io/distill.

articles.title: Dr. Ron Pat-El
Publications
articles.contents:
.pill {
  background-color: #f4ce33;
  border: none;
  color: black;
  padding: 10px 20px;
  text-align: center;
  text-decoration: none;
  display: inline-block;
  margin: 4px 2px;
  cursor: pointer;
  border-radius: 16px;
}

List of publications
Peer-reviewed Journal
Articles 15




2022



Van Lankveld, J., Van den Eijnden, R. J. J. M., Emmerink, P. M. J., Ter
Bogt, T. M. F., Pat-El, R. J., & Vanwesenbeeck, I. (2022). An
indirect measure of implicit sexual assertiveness: Reliability and
validity of the sexual assertiveness IAT in young adults in the
Netherlands. Journal of Sex & Marital Therapy, in
press.



2021



Van Lankveld, J., Emmerink, P. M. J., Van den Eijnden, R. J. J. M., Ter

implicit measure of sexual double standard endorsement in emerging
adults: Reliability and validity aspects. Sexuality &
Culture.
https://doi.org/10.1007/s12119-021-09917-7






Visser, L., Lataster, J., van Lankveld, J., Pat-El, R. J., &

https://doi.org/10.5334/pb.1042






Strijbos, J.-W., Pat-El, R. J., & Narciss, S. (2021).

2020



van Lankveld, W., Pat-El, R. J., van Melick, N., van Cingel, R.,

17(18), 13.
https://doi.org/10.3390/ijerph17186764



2019



Mouw, J. M., Saab, N., Pat-El, R. J., & Broek, P. V. D.

Espin, C. A., Saab, N., Pat-El, R. J., Boender, P. D. M., &

2017
